metadata.description: OWASP-compliant security tests covering all 66 categories

owasp_tests.name: Robots.txt Disclosure 1
owasp_tests.description: Test if robots.txt exposes sensitive paths 1

steps.rationale: Robots.txt should not reveal admin paths
Sitemap should not expose internal structure

owasp_tests.expected_behavior: No sensitive information in discovery files
